title: ENR Russia: feu vert des actionnaires à la décotation
cleaned_sentences: Geneva (AWP) - Gathered on Friday in an extraordinary general meeting, the shareholders of the Participation Company ENR Russia accepted the proposal to withdraw stocks from the Stock Exchange.
The Board of Directors will thus be able to undertake the necessary measures for the decoration of the titles out of six, the company said in a press release.
ENR Russia was taken over by the Valartis financial group, which held, after its buyout offer, 99.76% of the actions of the company based in Geneva.
As part of the operation, Valartis gives up his minority participation in Athris Holding by Georg von Opel and receives in return 892,703 actions ENR Russia and a cash payment.
Athris Holding, which is listed at a Berne BX Stock Exchange, held a participation of a good third party in ENR Russia, according to previous data.
